my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Lihat! Ada anak burung terjatuh dari sarangnya.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Ayuh! Bantu anak burung itu ke sangkarnya.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Anak burung itu sudah selamat. Dan huruf Hijaiyah ketiga sudah kelihatan.

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Tepat sekali, dua ekor burung di sarang berbentuk huruf Hijaiyah Ta.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: The baby bird has fell out of its nest.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Rescue that baby bird and place it back in its nest.

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: You have saved the baby bird.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: ...the third Hijaiyah letter can also be spotted now!

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: That is correct! The baby birds with the nest look like...

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Alhamdulillah, we sure are lucky to have you with us, @user.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: Let's continue on our journey now.
